messages.title: Change the Direction of the Country
messages.content: Only Mike Thornton will be the strong opposition to Conservative cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike Thornton is fighting to protect our NHS from further Conservative cuts.
The Conservatives are cutting school budgets and leaving the social care system in tatters.
Mike Thornton will be the effective opposition we need to get a better deal for our area.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Eastleigh, your choice is clear: It's Lib Dem or Conservatives here.

issues.education: The Conservatives are cutting school budgets. All schools in England likely to face real-term cuts.
issues.health: The Conservatives are slashing NHS funding. Mike Thornton and the Lib Dems will fight Conservative NHS cuts.

community.content: The General Election on June 8th is your opportunity to stop them by electing a Lib Dem MP again here in Eastleigh.

leaflet.personalStatement: A real voice for Eastleigh in Parliament.

contactInformation.address: Eastleigh Liberal Democrats, FREEPOST RTLH-YYCX-BIXE, 107 Leigh Road, Eastleigh, SO50 9DR

images.caption: Mike Thornton is fighting to protect our NHS from further Conservative cuts.

examples: Hospital cuts planned in most of England - BBC, 7 February 2017
The Conservatives are slashing NHS funding, cutting school budgets and leaving the social care system in tatters.
Mike will be the effective opposition we need to get a better deal for our area.
Only the Lib Dems can stop them.
This is our chance for change.
Local NHS services are under threat
The Conservatives are slashing NHS funding.
Hospital cuts planned in most of England.
All schools in England likely to face real-term cuts.
The Conservatives are slashing NHS funding.
Leaving the social care system in tatters.
A Conservative win here in Eastleigh would give Theresa May a blank cheque to make further cuts to our schools and NHS.
